amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the Orbital Traffic Management study includes input from nonprofit organizations that conduct research in space traffic and orbital activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 114-127 to ensure the Orbital Traffic Management study includes input from nonprofit organizations that conduct research in space traffic and orbital activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
